Text:
THX! Great work as usual from the PS3 TEAM!
Any chance of getting "This is it" in 1080p in PS3 TEAM style :-))

hey, where is 'district 9' which was supposed to b uploaded with hardcoded alien subs ...... ???
hope its on its way :))
BTW wish u n the entire PS3-TEAM a very happy and "full-HD" New Year .... :D
and thanx for the great work ... keep it up.

hey Akamaru-, i m a big fan of urs b'coz of the animation movies that u upload ... keep them coming bro ... god bless u.
zax808 has uploaded 'district 9' with subs. sorry for the trouble. i was not sure abt who had uploaded the first one without subs.
No worries, like i said everyone else is doing live action, so i'll be working on animation for a bit.
@ taz, huh? i don't get it.

Hey Akamaru, is 'Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs' out on bluray yet? coz i had seen one bluray-rip by 'secretmyth' a long time ago but nothing after that. 
i m waiting for PS3-TEAM to upload it.

(BTW, u r doing a great job by uploading animation movies which makes u a special PS3-TEAM member for the animation freaks like us. so just dont listen to the fools, who dont even know what they r commentin' about.)
any anime on the way or just american animations?

@ hewillseethebigboard, i have anime ready to upload, but i still have a lot of other american animation i want to get out the way.

Anime:
Akira
Appleseed Ex:machina
Afro Samurai
Afro Samurai resurrection
Dragon BAll Z The one with Broli i think??
Deadspace (not sure if this one is Japanese)
Sword of the stranger
Origins: Spirits of the past

lol what's the deal with taz, hes such a clown. are you some pre-teen taz? then stop clowning around. and there is no episode with broly, any dbz fan would know that.

Anyway Akamaru, great J.O.B. so far and can't wait for the rest! happy new belated year!
